org.ldaptive.provider
Interface ProviderConnectionFactory<T extends ProviderConfig>

Type Parameters:
T - type of provider config for this connection factory
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractJLdapConnectionFactory, AbstractProviderConnectionFactory, ApacheLdapConnectionFactory, JLdapConnectionFactory, JLdapSSLConnectionFactory, JLdapStartTLSConnectionFactory, JndiConnectionFactory, JndiStartTLSConnectionFactory, NetscapeConnectionFactory, OpenDJConnectionFactory, OpenDSConnectionFactory, UnboundIDConnectionFactory, UnboundIDStartTLSConnectionFactory
public interface ProviderConnectionFactory<T extends ProviderConfig>

Provides an interface for creating provider connections.

Version:
